body.name: TP-Link Deco-W2400 AC1200 Wireless Dual-Band Mesh Wi-Fi System 2-Pack - Certified Refurbished
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 16 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Deco uses a system of units to achieve seamless whole-home Wi-Fi coverage — eliminate weak signal areas once and for all!

With advanced Deco Mesh Technology, units work together to form a unified network with a single network name. Devices automatically switch between Decos as you move through your home for the fastest possible speeds.*
A Deco W2400 two-pack delivers Wi-Fi to an area of up to 3,000 square feet. And if that’s not enough, simply add more Decos to the network anytime to increase coverage.*
Deco W2400 provides fast and stable connections with speeds of up to 1167 Mbps and works with the major internet service provider (ISP) and modem.**
Deco can handle traffic from even the busiest of networks, providing lag-free connections for up to 100 devices.*
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just had Fiber Optic internet ran into our house..The technician recommended these to get a strong WiFi signal throughout our house..Very easy to install and setup!!Just follow along with the app that you download and your off and running!!These work perfectly for the size of our house. We have 3 levels. The main router is in the back bedroom and the second one is down on our foyer.We get a perfect WIFI signal through out are whole house and even outside in our Travel trailer sitting out in our driveway!I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND these!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best value! Peace of mind is priceless.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these and they arrived right on schedule two days later. I set them up myself (millenial… familiar with tech but not outstanding) in less than 20 minutes! So far, we’re on day 3 with these and they’re definitely worth every penny. The parental controls feature on the app is so great and extremely customizable (with no subscription required). I can easily add the members of my household, assign their devices, pick an age level, customize bedtimes, and more. Our house is very wifi dependent, so I needed something reliable and strong. We all get great service throughout the house and it’s so much easier than switching back and forth manually using an extender. Another added bonus is the aesthetic design of the devices. They’re definitely more modern and better looking than our old router with tons of long antennas! As long as these continue to work well, they’re the best purchase we’ve made in a very long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got the refurbished ones and they didn't come with instructions but youtube helped a lot
reviews.reviewText: My wifi is in the back of the house and I have 3 floors and it was hard to get it upstairs and right now these are working perfectly. Would purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Don't like using my to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unit for the money
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my sister when she moved up here. So she didn't have to pay the internet company for their lousy router. It's gonna pay for itself in under six months and it has way better coverage. You really can't ask for an easier installation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it should

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I wanted these to work so bad...
reviews.reviewText: I'm an IT novice so I had my dad, (who did this for a living) to do the technical side and I would do the physical side of getting this system running.My plan was to use one as an AP from my house and the other two as clients 110 yards away for my solar panels and one for my barn.We followed the Instructions and even followed YouTube videos and it never worked. My dad spent two 12 hour days on it before we called technical support. Tech support was friendly and knowledgeable but they couldn't figure out the problem either. I spent 2.5 hours taking screenshots and emailing them proof that it wasn't working. We tried reseting the devices, different laptops, trying different devices as the AP and client. Finally tech support said they had to refer us to someone else.At this point I had the system for 3 weeks. I couldn't wait for them to figure it out and get back to me as my 30 day return window was approaching.I returned them to Amazon for a full refund. I feel the worst for my dad. He was racking his brain for 2 days trying to set this up. He is very patient as I was pissed enough for both of us. It was a waste of time. YMMV, Good luck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great. Very simple and easy upgrade.
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Straightforward and easy upgrade. I wish I tried it earlier instead of WiFi Boaster. AP functions work great only took a few minutes to install and setup the app.
Me encanta que haya funcionado tan bien; gracias a la app te permite bloquear dispositivos que se lleguen a colgar a tu red y eso hace un montón la diferencia.

Me ayudaron bastante estos productos deco, había escuchado y visto reseñas de estos productos wi-fi mesh pero como tenía un repetidor me conformaba con ese, lo adquirí porque a veces me fallaba el repetidor ó me llegaba con poca velocidad, la verdad es que no me arrepiento de haber adquirido estos TP-Link, todos los puntos muertos que había en la casa (de 3 pisos) ahora tienen señal, aun estando lejos de un deco me llega con buena velocidad, hice varias pruebas. Solo bajé la app de la marca, me registré y seguí paso a paso la instalación, es muy sencillo, además tiene control parental y opciones para mandar a lista negra dispositivos que no reconozcas y estén usando el internet y algunas opciones más.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen funcionamiento y sin ningún problema.
reviews.reviewText: Aunque su rango no es tan amplio sirve muy bien para mejorar y ampliar más el internet. Y no tuve problema alguno con el producto.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gran alternativa de extender tu red
reviews.reviewText: El dispositivo se conecta a tu red de menta muy sencilla, es fácil de configurar y puedes hacer puntos específicos de conexión para tus visitas, tiene control parental y puedes desconectar usuarios que veas. Muy buena alternativa me encantó.
Muy útil y la funcionalidad de poner nombres a los dispositivos y bloquear accesos a otros está genial
